mapper.update: /* com.whomade.planfAi.admin.menu.mapper.MenuMapper.updateMenu */ UPDATE op_menu SET MENU_TY_CODE = #{menuTyCode}, MENU_NM = #{menuNm}, URL = #{url}, SORT_ORDR = #{sortOrdr}, USE_YN = #{useYn}, SORT_ORDR_1 = #{sortOrdr1}, SORT_ORDR_2 = #{sortOrdr2}, SORT_ORDR_3 = #{sortOrdr3}, SORT_ORDR_4 = #{sortOrdr4}, SORT_ORDR_5 = #{sortOrdr5}, SORT_ORDR_6 = #{sortOrdr6}, UPDUSR_NO = #{updusrNo}, UPDT_DT = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE MENU_ID = #{menuId}
mapper.delete: /* com.whomade.planfAi.admin.menu.mapper.MenuMapper.deleteMenu */ DELETE FROM op_menu WHERE MENU_ID LIKE CONCAT(#{menuId}, '%')
